{"id":488772636,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 month, 3 weeks","timestamp":1620139016,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"8 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/488772636/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Reverse Vowels of a String","memory":"8.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string reverseVowels(string s) {\n        vector<int> locs;\n        string vowels = \"aeiouAEIOU\";\n        for (int i = 0; i < s.size(); i++) {\n            int f = vowels.find(s[i]);\n            if (f != -1) locs.push_back(i);\n        }\n        for (int i = 0; i < locs.size() / 2; i++) {\n            swap(s[locs[i]], s[locs[locs.size() - i - 1]]);\n        } \n        return s;\n    }\n};\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"reverse-vowels-of-a-string"}
